sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>public</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>global.LFNLUModelProcessor</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <description>Script that is used while processing or translating an artifact</description> <name>LFNLUModelProcessor</name> <script><![CDATA[var LFNLUModelProcessor = Class.create(); LFNLUModelProcessor.prototype = Object.extendsObject(LFArtifactProcessorSNC, { category: 'localization_framework', // DO NOT REMOVE THIS LINE!
/********** * Returns LFDocumentContent object for the given artifact record * * @param params.tableName The table name of the artifact record * @param params.sysId The sys-id of the artifact record * @param params.language Language into which the artifact has to be translated into (Target language) * @return LFDocumentContent object **********/ getTranslatableContent: function(params) { return new NLULFDocumentContentBuilder().getDocumentContent('v1', params.language, params.sysId, params.tableName); },
/********** * Uncomment the saveTranslatedContent function definition to write a custom save script * Stores translations into standard tables by default * * Optional Return * * @param documentContent LFDocumentContent object that can be parsed to obtain translated values * @return **********/ saveTranslatedContent: function(documentContent) { new NLULFDocumentContentParser(documentContent).saveModel(); },
type: 'LFNLUModelProcessor' });]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2021-05-13 17:42:02</sys_created_on> <sys_id>7d9c3f160f403010c0774ee7c8767e8e</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>LFNLUModelProcessor</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="NLU Workbench - Core" source="com.glide.nlu">302438683c31311068bcf327dfe37f2f</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_7d9c3f160f403010c0774ee7c8767e8e</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2021-05-18 07:57:52</sys_updated_on> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
